fields.name: SharedStorageAccountName
fields.description: The full name of the shared storage account. If it is not provided, it will be defaulted to {SID}nfs{guid of 15 chars}.

fields.name: SharedStorageAccountPrivateEndPointName
fields.description: The full name of private end point for the shared storage account. If it is not provided, it will be defaulted to {storageAccountName}_pe
